description: Scans a provided CycloneDX 1.5 SBOM and reports on any vulnerabilities discovered in that SBOM. You can generate compatible SBOMs for your resources using the `Amazon Inspector SBOM generator.

parameters.name: sbom
parameters.description: The JSON file for the SBOM you want to scan. The SBOM must be in CycloneDX 1.5 format.

nested_items.name: sbom
nested_items.description: The vulnerability report for the scanned SBOM.
